channel.title: Immutable state (quick note)
channel.description:
Series variables are now locked by default. example: "An example" reverse example now results in an error.
The place this is done in the code is in ren-c/src/os/host-console.r at line 693. lock code

item.title: Immutable state (quick note)
item.dc:creator: gchiu
item.description:
It's been like that for a long long time.

Read full topic
